overview.ovdesc:
CR CR.OTHER.PRODUCTS CR.OTHER.PRODUCTS
CR.OTHER.PRODUCTS is a reference table for any external products which a customer might have. This is purely for information purpose only.

desc.p: Other textual information updated regarding customer relationship with financial institute
Validation Rules
: Free text format
Date on which customer information is lastly updated.
Validation Rules
Up to 9 date characters (standard Date format) - Type D.
This is the unique identifier of CR Other Products.
Validation Rules
Must be 1 – 35 alphanumeric characters
Descriptive information about the Institution where product is held by the customer.
Validation Rules
: Must be 1 – 35 alphanumeric characters
Unique number that identifies the financial institute Either INSTITUTION.NO OR INSTITUTION.DESC needs to be Input.
Validation Rules
: It should be a valid customer Key
Start date of customer’s ownership to the product
Validation Rules
: Up to 9 date characters (standard Date format) - Type D.
Specifies the name of the product owned by the customer
Validation Rules
: Must be 1 – 35 alphanumeric characters
Specifies the current Balance of assets owned by the customer.
Validation Rules
: Standard Amount Format. (Mandatory Input)
Identifies the currency of the customer.
Validation Rules
: 1. 3 type SSS (uppercase alpha) character or 1-3 numeric character Currency code 2. It must be an existing code on the CURRENCY Table. (Mandatory Input)
Identifies the Customer to whom the Product belongs.
Validation Rules
1-10 numeric character Customer Code or 3-10 type MNE (uppercase alpha or numeric or '.') character Customer Mnemonic. (Mandatory Input)
End date of financial relationship of customer with the institute
Validation Rules
: Up to 9 date characters (standard Date format) - Type D
